DLP setup

Walkthrough

Focus

Show a Siemen’s star for focus adjustment with VAMToolbox.DLP.Setup.Focus. The number of slices in the star can be changed with the slices argument.

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import VAMToolbox as vam
    
    vam.DLP.Setup.Focus(slices=20,N_screen=(1920,1080))

Axis alignment

Show 3 lines for axis alignment with VAMToolbox.DLP.Setup.AxisAlignment. The line thickness, line separation, and line u-axis center offset can be changed with the arguments.

    vam.DLP.Setup.AxisAlignment(half_line_thickness=1,half_line_separation=200)

Tip

Use the up/down arrow keys to change line thickness, left/right arrow keys to change line separation, and comma/period keys to change the line center offset while the displaying on the DLP device.

Example file

examples/DLPsetup.py
if __name__ == "__main__":
    import VAMToolbox as vam
    
    vam.DLP.Setup.Focus(slices=20,N_screen=(1920,1080))

    vam.DLP.Setup.AxisAlignment(half_line_thickness=1,half_line_separation=200)
